name: Anas al-Sharif
bio: Al Jazeera correspondent killed in an Israeli airstrike on August 11, 2025, along with four colleagues. He was a prominent journalist covering events in Gaza.
note: Updated with real data based on recent events.

name: Ismail al-Ghoul
bio: Prominent Al Jazeera correspondent killed in 2024 in an air strike in Gaza City.

name: Rami al-Rifi
bio: Al Jazeera cameraman killed in 2024 in an air strike in Gaza City.
